title: Concerning Children - focus of argument shifts

content.question: In the course of the second paragraph (lines 6-21), the focus of the argument shifts from

choices.label: foreigners’ language acquisition to foreigners’ adoption of local customs
adults’ view of children to children’s view of themselves
older children’s learning to infants’ learning
adults’ language acquisition to children’s learning in general

content.answer: adults’ language acquisition to children’s learning in general

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
